    • Method Detail

      • getActionDescription

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder getActionDescription(rst.domotic.action.ActionParameterType.ActionParameter actionParameter,
                                                                                                      rst.domotic.action.ActionAuthorityType.ActionAuthority actionAuthority,
                                                                                                      rst.communicationpatterns.ResourceAllocationType.ResourceAllocation.Initiator initiator)
        Get an ActionDescription which only misses unit and service information. Fields which are still missing after:
        • ActionDescription.Label
        • ActionDescription.Description
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ResourceId
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.Description
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.UnitId
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ServiceType
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ServiceAttributeType
        • ActionDescription.ServiceStateDescription.ServiceAttribute
        Parameters:
        actionParameter - type which contains several parameters which are updated in the actionDescription
        actionAuthority - the actionAuthority for the actionDescription
        initiator - the initiator type for the resourceAllocation in the actionDescription
        Returns:
        an ActionDescription that only misses unit and service information

      • getActionDescription

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder getActionDescription(rst.domotic.action.ActionAuthorityType.ActionAuthority actionAuthority,
                                                                                                      rst.communicationpatterns.ResourceAllocationType.ResourceAllocation.Initiator initiator)
        Get an ActionDescription which only misses unit and service information. Is created with default ActionParameter. Fields which are still missing after:
        • ActionDescription.Label
        • ActionDescription.Description
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ResourceId
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.Description
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.UnitId
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ServiceType
        • ActionDescription.ResourceAllocation.ServiceAttributeType
        • ActionDescription.ServiceStateDescription.ServiceAttribute
        Parameters:
        actionAuthority - the actionAuthority for the actionDescription
        initiator - the initiator type for the resourceAllocation in the actionDescription
        Returns:

      • getDefaultActionParameter

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionParameterType.ActionParameter getDefaultActionParameter()
        Get default ActionParameter. These are:
        • Empty initiator, which means that the action has not been triggered by another action
        • Priority = NORMAL
        • ExecutionTimePeriod = 0
        • ExecutionValidityTime = an hour after creation of the ActionParameter type
        • Policy = FIRST
        • UnitType = UNKNOWN
        Returns:
        an ActionParameter type with the described values

      • getAllocationInterval

        public static rst.timing.IntervalType.Interval getAllocationInterval(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder actionDescription)
        Create an interval which start now and ends after the maximum of MIN_ALLCOCATION_TIME_MILLI and the executionTimePeriod. Updates the executionTimePeriod of the given actionDescription.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - actionDescription
        Returns:
        an Interval generated as described above

      • updateResourceAllocationSlot

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder updateResourceAllocationSlot(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder actionDescription)
        Update the slot of the ResourceAllocation based on the current time and the values of the ActionDescription. To generate the slot the method getAllocationInterval is used.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the ActionDescription inside which the ResourceAllocation is updated
        Returns:
        the updated ActionDescription

      • getActionReferenceFromActionDescription

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionReferenceType.ActionReference getActionReferenceFromActionDescription(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescriptionOrBuilder actionDescription)
        Build an ActionReference from a given ActionDescription which can be added to an action chain.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the ActionDescription from which the ActionReference is generated
        Returns:
        an ActionReference for the given ActionDescription

      • updateActionChain

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder updateActionChain(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder actionDescription,
                                                                                                   rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescriptionOrBuilder parentAction)
        Updates the ActionChain which is a description of actions that lead to this action. The action chain is updated in a way that the immediate parent is the first element of the chain. So the index of the chain indicates how many actions are in between this action and the causing action.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the ActionDescription which is updated
        parentAction - the ActionDescription of the action which is the cause for the new action
        Returns:
        the updated ActionDescription

      • hasResourceAllocationToken

        public static boolean hasResourceAllocationToken(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescriptionOrBuilder actionDescription)
        Check if the ResourceAllocation inside the ActionDescription has a token in its id field.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the ActionDescription which is checked
        Returns:
        true if the id field contains a # which it the token separator and else false

      • generateToken

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder generateToken(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder actionDescription)
        Add a token to the id field of the ResourceAllocation inside the ActionDescription. This method does nothing if the id already contains a token.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the ActionDescription which is updated
        Returns:
        the updated ActionDescription

      • updateResourceAllocationId

        public static rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder updateResourceAllocationId(rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription.Builder actionDescription)
        Get a new id value for the id field in the ResourceAllocation of an ActionDescription while keeping the token if there si one.
        Parameters:
        actionDescription - the action description which is updated as described above
        Returns:
        the action description which is updated as described above

      • getDescription

        public static String getDescription(Collection<rst.domotic.action.ActionDescriptionType.ActionDescription> actionDescriptionCollection)
        Method generates a description for the given action pipeline.
        Parameters:
        actionDescriptionCollection - a collection of depending action descriptions.
        Returns:
        a human readable description of the action pipeline.
